GOV.UK Frontend APCA calculations

APCA's rough boundaries:

  • Lc. <15 — Unsuitable for any use.
  • Lc. 15 — Suitable for non-text contrast on disabled elements.
  • Lc. 30 — Suitable for text on disabled elements and incidental text (e.g. copyright notice).
  • Lc. 45 — Suitable for logotypes and other very short text.
  • Lc. 60 — Suitable for non-text contrast and larger text (e.g. headings).
  • Lc. 75 — Suitable for prosaic text above ≅18px.
  • Lc. 90+ — Suitable for proasic text above ≅16px.

Colour palette scores

APCA scores for each of the colour combinations possible with the GOV.UK Frontend palette.

APCA scores are contextual on usage, so the same combination may receive different scores depending on which colour is the foreground and which is the background.

Minimum font size and weights

GDS Transport has a reference ratio of 1.05, due to having a slightly smaller x-height than the reference typeface (Helvetica). This means that the minimum font sizes needed are 0.05× higher than their reference equivalents, rounded up.

As we only use Transport in 400 and 700 weights, and these are very close to their Helvetica equivalents, no weight offset has been applied.

100 200 300 400 500 600 700 800 900
Lc. 15 🚫 🚫 🚫 🚫 🚫 🚫 🚫 🚫 🚫
Lc. 30 🚫 🚫 126.0px 113.4px 113.4px 100.8px 75.6px 75.6px 75.6px
Lc. 45 113.4px 100.8px 75.6px 44.1px 33.6px 29.4px 25.2px 25.2px 25.2px
Lc. 60 75.6px 50.4px 44.1px 25.2px 22.1px 18.9px 16.8px 16.8px 18.9px
Lc. 75 63.0px 44.1px 25.2px 18.9px 16.8px 15.8px 14.7px 16.8px 18.9px
Lc. 90 50.4px 33.6px 22.1px 16.8px 16.3px 15.2px 14.7px 16.8px 18.9px
Lc. 100 44.1px 28.4px 19.4px 15.8px 15.2px 14.2px 13.7px 16.8px 18.9px
